title: Diesel / Heavy Equipment Mechanic NEW!
full_description: A-1 Asphalt is in search of a Diesel / Heavy Equipment Mechanic to join our team. Our fleet consists of light and heavy-duty trucks, Bobcats and construction equipment. Strong automotive, mechanical, diagnostic, problem-solving skills and repair experience required. Mechanic certification, ASE, or similar, preferred.This position requires at least a Chauffeur driver license, however a CDL is preferred. A current DOT Medical Card is required.Diesel / Heavy Equipment Mechanic Benefits:Medical, Dental, Vision, Life Insurance, Short-Term DisabilityRoth and Traditional 401(k)Paid HolidaysLots of overtime from April through November
